name: Sun Alliance Hall
description:
SUNSET ALLIANCE HALL is a third person action tower defence game where you use traps instead of towers! Created by a team of 3 within 7 weeks!

CONTROLS (PC / XBOX) - Can use PS controller aswell:

Space / A: Jump
LShift / LStick: Sprint
LMB / Right Trigger: Build & shoot
R / X: Reload B / B: Enter build mode
RMB / Right Bumper: Rotate trap
X / Y: Sell Trap
Enter / LBumper: Start next wave
Q - E / (DPad) Left - Right: Change trap
1, 2, 3: Change trap
Escape / Pause: Back out

DEVELOPERS:

Dan Mercer: Games / Mechanics Design - https://danielmercer.wixsite.com/mysite
